Hello gents, I own a MacBook Pro and would love to be able to use the Whack-a-Kerbal function or hack gravity. However, I cannot access the cheat console because F12 is by default the volume raise button. How can I fix this so that ALT+F12 Does not make sound options pop-up instead?

-Cheers.
Instead of just doing ALT-F4, you do ALT-fn-F4 on Mac. It might be alt-option-f4, try both.

Instead of just doing ALT-F4, you do ALT-fn-F4 on Mac. It might be alt-option-f4, try both.

ALT and Option are the same key on my MacBook.

But thank you.
Option + F12 should work on your mac... If not, under options menu... edit your key bindings...

Instead of just doing ALT-F4, you do ALT-fn-F4 on Mac. It might be alt-option-f4, try both.
